key.name: autoconfig
key.summary: Automatic determination of the REST API interface URI and the API Key
key.description: Automatic configuration of the web interface URI. If set to 'true', probe file 'config.xml' for the URI and the API Key, otherwise use the user-provided options.

key.name: configuration-uri
key.description: The URI to load when the 'Web Interface' button is clicked.

key.name: api-key
key.description: An API Key used to authenticate to Syncthing.

key.name: external-browser
key.summary: Always open the web interface in the external browser
key.description: Always open the web interface in the external browser, never use the built-in webview.
